item.title: Mentioned by The Guardian Charlottetown
item.description:
Only poll that matters is on election day, Leslie tells PEI NDP
The only poll that matters for the P.E.I. NDP is the one on election day, Halifax MP Megan Leslie told supporters at the party's annual convention in Charlottetown Saturday. Leslie, who is deputy leader and environment critic for the federal opposition, was ...

item.title: Mentioned by CBC.ca
item.description:
NDP popularity growing on the Island, says party
A standing ovation for federal NDP MP Megan Leslie at the P.E.I. convention. (Patrick Faller/CBC). The New Democratic Party says the province of red sand is ready to go orange in the next election, even though they've only ever won one seat on Prince ...
